description: Describes the specified speaker enrollment job.

parameters.name: DomainId
parameters.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the speaker enrollment job.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The identifier of the speaker enrollment job you are describing.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when the speaker enrollment job was created.

nested_items.name: DataAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that grants Voice ID permissions to access customer's buckets to read the input manifest file and write the job output file.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the speaker enrollment job.

nested_items.name: EndedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when the speaker enrollment job ended.

nested_items.name: EnrollmentConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration that defines the action to take when the speaker is already enrolled in Voice ID, and the FraudDetectionConfig to use.

nested_items.name: ExistingEnrollmentAction
nested_items.description: The action to take when the specified speaker is already enrolled in the specified domain. The default value is SKIP, which skips the enrollment for the existing speaker. Setting the value to OVERWRITE replaces the existing voice prints and enrollment audio stored for that speaker with new data generated from the latest audio.

nested_items.name: FraudDetectionConfig
nested_items.description: The fraud detection configuration to use for the speaker enrollment job.

nested_items.name: FraudDetectionAction
nested_items.description: The action to take when the given speaker is flagged by the fraud detection system. The default value is FAIL, which fails the speaker enrollment. Changing this value to IGNORE results in the speaker being enrolled even if they are flagged by the fraud detection system.

nested_items.name: RiskThreshold
nested_items.description: Threshold value for determining whether the speaker is a high risk to be fraudulent. If the detected risk score calculated by Voice ID is greater than or equal to the threshold, the speaker is considered a fraudster.

nested_items.name: WatchlistIds
nested_items.description: The identifier of watchlists against which fraud detection is performed.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FailureDetails
nested_items.description: Contains details that are populated when an entire batch job fails. In cases of individual registration job failures, the batch job as a whole doesn't fail; it is completed with a JobStatus of COMPLETED_WITH_ERRORS. You can use the job output file to identify the individual registration requests that failed.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A description of the error that caused the batch job failure.

nested_items.name: StatusCode
nested_items.description: An HTTP status code representing the nature of the error.

nested_items.name: InputDataConfig
nested_items.description: The input data config containing an S3 URI for the input manifest file that contains the list of speaker enrollment job requests.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: The S3 location for the input manifest file that contains the list of individual enrollment or registration job requests.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: The service-generated identifier for the speaker enrollment job.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The client-provided name for the speaker enrollment job.

nested_items.name: JobProgress
nested_items.description: Provides details on job progress. This field shows the completed percentage of registration requests listed in the input file.

nested_items.name: PercentComplete
nested_items.description: Shows the completed percentage of enrollment or registration requests listed in the input file.

nested_items.name: JobStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the speaker enrollment job.

nested_items.name: OutputDataConfig
nested_items.description: The output data config containing the S3 location where Voice ID writes the job output file; you must also include a KMS key ID to encrypt the file.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the KMS key you want Voice ID to use to encrypt the output file of a speaker enrollment job/fraudster registration job.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: The S3 path of the folder where Voice ID writes the job output file. It has a *.out extension. For example, if the input file name is input-file.json and the output folder path is s3://output-bucket/output-folder, the full output file path is s3://output-bucket/output-folder/job-Id/input-file.json.out.
